pages.text: 'Gob, King of Gnomes' is the first boss in Terramity's progression.$(br2)He can be found in a 'Court of Gnomes', a structure only found in dark forests and swamps.$(br2)Recommended Gear:$(br) -Diamond/Netherite armor$(br) -Strong weapon

Can be summoned by right clicking a gold gnome statue with a $(l:terramity:misc/gnome_bartering)red gnome hat$().$(br2)A gold gnome statue can be found at a 'Court of Gnomes' structure, found only in dark forests and swamps.
